text: ““E iwe mwana wanga! Ndithu icho (chabwino ndi choipa cha munthu) ngakhale chitakhala cholemera ngati njere ya mpiru ndi kukhala mkati mwa thanthwe kapena m’kati mwa thambo, kapena mkati mwa nthaka, Allah adzachibweretsa (ndi kumulipira amene adachita). Ndithu Allah Ngodziwa zinthu zobisika, (ndiponso) Ngodziwa zinthu zoonekera.”
